title: Hologram Theater Adventure #2
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Hologram Control Booth
rooms.description: A cramped technical booth filled with glowing control panels and holographic displays. Cables snake across the floor, and multiple screens show different angles of the darkened theater below. The air hums with electronic equipment. Emergency lighting casts everything in a blue glow. A large window overlooks the main stage.

items.name: main control console
items.description: The primary control station with multiple screens and input terminals
items.text: SYSTEM STATUS: Holographic projectors online. Theater capacity: 500 seats. Emergency protocols active. Director Nova Chen - access required for override.

items.name: technician's desk
items.description: A cluttered desk covered in maintenance logs and equipment manuals

items.name: theater operations manual
items.description: A thick binder with technical specifications and history
items.text: HOLOGRAM THEATER - Established 2087. Director: Nova Chen. This revolutionary theater uses advanced holographic projection technology to create immersive performances. The projection core is located beneath the main stage. Combination for secure storage: year of establishment.

items.name: silver access keycard
items.description: A keycard labeled 'STAGE ACCESS - AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL'

items.name: equipment storage rack
items.description: A metal rack holding various technical equipment and tools

items.name: maintenance log
items.description: A digital tablet with recent maintenance entries
items.text: Last Entry: Holographic projectors calibrated. The projection core beneath the stage is the heart of our system - without it, no show can run. Director Chen has been working on a special performance. Remember: only she can authorize emergency evacuation.

items.name: promotional poster
items.description: A holographic poster advertising the theater's latest show
items.text: EXPERIENCE THE FUTURE OF ENTERTAINMENT! Hologram Theater presents: Dreams in Light. Featuring cutting-edge holographic technology that brings performances to life. Director Nova Chen's vision realized.

items.name: locked equipment cabinet
items.description: A secure cabinet with a keycard reader

items.name: brass stage key
items.description: A key labeled 'MAIN STAGE ACCESS'

items.name: technician's note
items.description: A handwritten note from the technical staff
items.text: Reminder: The Director's Suite can only be accessed from the main stage. Security system requires knowledge of theater operations. Director Chen is very particular about security protocols.

items.name: booth exit door
items.description: A heavy door with a brass lock leading down to the main stage area

rooms.name: Main Theater Stage
rooms.description: A vast stage surrounded by rows of empty seats rising into darkness. Holographic projectors are mounted on the ceiling and walls, their lenses gleaming. The stage floor is marked with positioning guides and technical markings. A trapdoor in the center leads to the projection core below. The Director's Suite entrance is visible on the far wall, sealed with a security panel.

items.name: holographic projector array
items.description: An array of advanced projectors creating the theater's signature effects
items.text: PROJECTOR ARRAY: Model HT-2087. Capable of generating fully three-dimensional holographic performances. Powered by the projection core located beneath the stage. Maintenance required by certified technicians only.

items.name: stage trapdoor
items.description: A trapdoor with a handle, leading down to the technical areas

items.name: projection core note
items.description: A note attached near the trapdoor
items.text: PROJECTION CORE ACCESS: The holographic projection core is the heart of this theater's technology. All performances depend on this system. Director Chen designed the entire theater around this revolutionary technology.

items.name: director's chair
items.description: An ornate chair at the edge of the stage with Director Chen's name on it

items.name: director's notes
items.description: A leather-bound notebook with Director Chen's personal notes
items.text: Director Nova Chen - Personal Notes: This theater is my life's work. The holographic projection core makes the impossible possible. I am the only one authorized to initiate emergency evacuation protocols. The future of entertainment is here.

items.name: stage lighting console
items.description: A control panel for stage lighting and effects
items.text: LIGHTING CONTROL: Integrated with holographic systems. All controls route through the projection core beneath the stage. Emergency override available in Director's Suite.

items.name: prop storage area
items.description: A section backstage with various theatrical props and equipment

items.name: theater program
items.description: A glossy program from a recent performance
items.text: HOLOGRAM THEATER PRESENTS: An evening of wonder and innovation. Founded in 2087 by visionary Director Nova Chen. Our revolutionary holographic projection core creates experiences unlike anything else in the world. Thank you for being part of the future.

items.name: Director's Suite entrance
items.description: An elegant door with a biometric security panel displaying three verification questions. A plaque reads 'Director Nova Chen - Private Suite'

password_questions.question: What is the heart of the theater's technology?
password_questions.hint: Check the maintenance log and technical notes about what powers the holographic system

password_questions.question: Where is the projection core located?
password_questions.hint: Multiple sources mention where the core is positioned

password_questions.question: Who authorizes emergency evacuation?
password_questions.hint: The director's notes and system status mention who has this authority

rooms.name: Director's Suite
rooms.description: You've reached the Director's Suite! A luxurious office with floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the theater. Awards and holographic art pieces line the walls. A sleek desk holds multiple screens showing theater operations. Most importantly, an emergency exit door stands open, revealing a stairway to street level and freedom. Fresh air flows in from outside.

items.name: director's desk
items.description: An elegant desk with holographic displays and personal mementos

items.name: wall of awards
items.description: Numerous awards and accolades for theatrical innovation and holographic technology
items.text: Awards for Director Nova Chen: Innovation in Holographic Entertainment, Theater of the Year 2089, Lifetime Achievement in Theatrical Technology. 'For revolutionizing the art of performance through holographic projection.'

items.name: emergency exit door
items.description: An open door with an illuminated exit sign, stairs leading down to street level

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You've reached the Director's Suite and found the emergency exit! As you descend the stairs to street level, you leave the darkened Hologram Theater behind. The cool night air greets you as you emerge onto the city streets. You've solved the puzzles and escaped the theater. You win!
